title: The Milkmaid
description: A maidservant pours milk, entirely absorbed in her work. Except for the stream of milk, everything else is still. Vermeer took this simple everyday activity and made it the subject of an impressive painting – the woman stands like a statue in the brightly lit room. Vermeer also had an eye for how light by means of hundreds of colourful dots plays over the surface of objects.

title: View of Delft
description: A serene cityscape by Vermeer, showcasing his mastery of light and color in an outdoor setting.

title: The Allegory of Painting
description: A symbolic depiction of an artist in his studio, believed to be one of Vermeer's most intricate works.

title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
description: One of Vermeer's most famous works, depicting a girl with an enigmatic expression, wearing a striking pearl earring.

title: Vitruvian Man
description: A study of human anatomy and proportion by Leonardo da Vinci, combining art and science.

title: Lady with an Ermine
description: A portrait of Cecilia Gallerani, exemplifying Leonardo's ability to capture personality and grace.

title: Mona Lisa
description: Leonardo da Vinci's masterpiece, a portrait of a woman with a mysterious smile, known for its intricate detail and atmospheric background.

title: The Last Supper
description: A depiction of Jesus and his disciples during the Last Supper, highlighting Da Vinci's mastery of composition and expression.

title: Starry Night
description: One of Van Gogh's most iconic works, illustrating a swirling night sky filled with stars over a quiet village.

title: Irises
description: A vibrant depiction of blooming irises, showing Van Gogh's fascination with nature's beauty.

title: Wheatfield with Crows
description: A dark, emotional painting by Van Gogh, often associated with his struggles.

title: Sunflowers
description: A vibrant still-life series by Van Gogh, showcasing his love for bold colors and thick brushstrokes.

title: Water Lilies
description: Claude Monet's impressionistic masterpiece that captures the play of light and reflection on water.

title: Impression, Sunrise
description: The painting that gave Impressionism its name, depicting a misty morning harbor with a rising sun.

title: Rouen Cathedral Series
description: A series of paintings by Monet capturing Rouen Cathedral under different light conditions.

title: The Japanese Bridge
description: An iconic view of Monet's garden in Giverny, featuring a delicate bridge over a pond of water lilies.

title: Three Musicians
description: A bold, colorful Cubist painting by Picasso, representing a surreal trio.

title: Weeping Woman
description: An emotionally charged portrait by Picasso, exploring themes of pain and grief.

title: Guernica
description: Pablo Picasso's large-scale mural that depicts the horrors of war with a striking and chaotic composition.

title: Les Demoiselles d'Avignon
description: A revolutionary piece by Picasso that broke traditional perspective and launched Cubism.

title: The Creation of Adam
description: A section of Michelangelo's Sistine Chapel ceiling fresco, depicting God giving life to Adam.

title: Pietà
description: Michelangelo's marble sculpture of the Virgin Mary mourning over the body of Jesus, exemplifying his sculptural mastery.

title: The Last Judgment
description: A fresco in the Sistine Chapel by Michelangelo, depicting the second coming of Christ and the final judgment.

title: David
description: Michelangelo's iconic marble sculpture, representing the biblical hero David in perfect Renaissance proportions.

title: Dream Caused by the Flight of a Bee
description: A surreal depiction of a dreamlike scene by Salvador Dalí, with vivid and imaginative imagery.

title: The Elephants
description: A surreal painting featuring elephants with elongated legs, showcasing Dalí's unique visual style.

title: The Persistence of Memory
description: Salvador Dalí's surrealistic depiction of melting clocks in a dreamlike landscape.

title: Swans Reflecting Elephants
description: A surreal painting by Dalí that uses reflections to create a double image of swans and elephants.

title: The Night Watch
description: A monumental group portrait by Rembrandt, known for its dramatic use of light and shadow.

title: Bathsheba at Her Bath
description: A deeply emotional painting by Rembrandt, exploring human vulnerability and beauty.

title: The Jewish Bride
description: A tender and intimate double portrait, highlighting Rembrandt's skill in capturing human relationships.

title: The Anatomy Lesson of Dr. Nicolaes Tulp
description: A group portrait showcasing Rembrandt's mastery of composition and lighting.
